named-query.name: findRoleByUserAccount
named-query.query: select role from RoleUserAuthorization rau join rau.role role join rau.user user where user.userAccount=? and rau.abolishDate>?

named-query.name: isRoleExist
named-query.query: select role from Role role where role.name=? and role.abolishDate>?

named-query.name: findRoleByName
named-query.query: select role from Role role where role.name=? and role.abolishDate>?
